languages.text: "Денз любил игрушки, но называл их именами попроще. Любимая винтовка у него звалась "Пуляла" — едва ли что-то еще он назвал бы "Покаяние".
"Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"
languages.original_text: "Денз любил игрушки, но называл их именами попроще. Любимая винтовка у него звалась "Пуляла" — едва ли что-то еще он назвал бы "Покаяние".

traits.locale_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favorite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call anything else Repentance."
"Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favorite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call anything else Repentance."
"Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"
"Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"
"Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

languages.text: “丹兹确实很喜欢他的玩具，但他只会给这些玩意儿起个简单的名字，比如他最喜欢的步枪叫‘啪啪小子’。我觉得他恐怕不会给什么东西起名叫‘忏悔’。”
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: “丹兹确实很喜欢他的玩具，但他只会给这些玩意儿起个简单的名字，比如他最喜欢的步枪叫‘啪啪小子’。我觉得他恐怕不会给什么东西起名叫‘忏悔’。”

languages.text: «A Denz le encantaban sus juguetes, pero les daba nombres mucho más simples. Su rifle favorito era Tiritos Pium Pium; dudo que llamara a otra cosa "Arrepentimiento"».
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: «A Denz le encantaban sus juguetes, pero les daba nombres mucho más simples. Su rifle favorito era Tiritos Pium Pium; dudo que llamara a otra cosa "Arrepentimiento"».

languages.text: 「確かにデンツは数々のおもちゃを所有していましたが、愛用していたものには簡単な名前を付けていました。お気に入りのライフルも『バンバン』と呼んでいたので…リペンタンスなどという名前を付けるとは考え難いです」
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: 「確かにデンツは数々のおもちゃを所有していましたが、愛用していたものには簡単な名前を付けていました。お気に入りのライフルも『バンバン』と呼んでいたので…リペンタンスなどという名前を付けるとは考え難いです」

languages.text: "Denz liebte seine Spielsachen, aber er gab ihnen simplere Namen. Sein Lieblingsgewehr nannte er Baller-Bumm-Bumm – ich denke nicht, dass er irgendetwas 'Repentanz' genannt hätte."
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: "Denz liebte seine Spielsachen, aber er gab ihnen simplere Namen. Sein Lieblingsgewehr nannte er Baller-Bumm-Bumm – ich denke nicht, dass er irgendetwas 'Repentanz' genannt hätte."

languages.text: « Denz aimait bien ce genre de jouets, je vous l'accorde, mais il leur donnait des noms bien plus... simplistes. Il avait appelé son fusil préféré Pan-Pan, alors autant vous dire qu'il est peu probable qu'il ait nommé une autre arme Repentance. »
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: « Denz aimait bien ce genre de jouets, je vous l'accorde, mais il leur donnait des noms bien plus... simplistes. Il avait appelé son fusil préféré Pan-Pan, alors autant vous dire qu'il est peu probable qu'il ait nommé une autre arme Repentance. »

languages.text: "Denz, oyuncaklarını severdi ama onlara daha basit isimler koyardı. En sevdiği tüfeğine Ateşli Dıkşın Dıkşın derdi mesela. Kalkıp da öyle bir şeye 'Tövbe' adını vereceğini sanmam."
languages.original_text: "Denz did love his toys, but the names he gave them were simpler than that. He called his favourite rifle Shooty Pew-Pew — I doubt he would call another thing 'Repentance.'"

traits.locale_text: "Denz silahlarını severdi ama onlara verdiği isimler daha basit şeylerdi. En sevdiği tüfeğine Ateşli Dıkşın Dıkşın derdi. Herhangi bir şeye 'Tövbe' adını vereceğini sanmıyorum."
